title: Two new volumes highlight cult, architecture at ancient Neapolis sanctuary
description: The Sanctuary of the Virgin at ancient Neapolis – patron goddess of the city founded by Thasian settlers in the 7th century BC – continues to reveal new insights centuries later, following the presentation of two scholarly volumes on recent research and long-unpublished finds.

title: Study reveals ancient hunter-gatherers adopted farming from migrant women
description: Ancient DNA reveals hunter-gatherers in north-western Europe, including the Netherlands and Belgium, adopted farming slowly, influenced by female migrants.

title: Programme revives traditional Tet in ancient capital
description: Its activities recreate the traditional Tet (Lunar New Year Festival) atmosphere of the former royal court. Visitors enjoyed court and folk games, immersive light displays, and traditional Tet cuisine.Imperial rituals revived in Hue with reenactment of Nguyen Dynasty New Year royal audienceTet flower street held for first time at Thang Long Imperial CitadelTransport plans ready for Lunar New Year peak

title: Ancient Silk Road hub Dunhuang welcomes off-season visitors
description: LANZHOU, Feb. 12 (Xinhua) -- Move over summer crowds. Dunhuang's winter charm is calling as more travelers flock to the heritage hub in northwest China's Gansu Province, home to three UNESCO World Heritage sites, with a range of winter initiatives awaiting visitors.At the Dunhuang Museum, guide Ma Xueli has seen a significant uptick in visitors.
